exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing U, V : NormedModule K x, y : U * V eps : R H : sqrt (norm (fst (plus y (opp x))) ^ 2 + norm (snd (plus y (opp x))) ^ 2) < eps The term "U" has type "NormedModule K" while it is expected to have type "NormedModule.mixin_of ?K ?V".

original: intros x y eps. unfold ball, prod_norm, minus. intros H. apply (NormedModule.ax3 _ _ U H).
